blogPost.excerpt: Spaceman is an application for macOS that allows you to view your Spaces in the menu bar. Spaceman allows you to see which space you are currently on relative to the other spaces you have. Naming these spaces is also an option.
blogPost.body: Spaceman is an application for macOS that allows you to view your Spaces in the menu bar. Spaceman allows you to see which space you are currently on relative to the other spaces you have. Naming these spaces is also an option.
blogPost.title: Spaceman - A macOS app to view virtual desktops in the menu bar
blogPost.author: Jay

localize.description: Spaceman是一款适用于macOS的应用程序，它允许你在菜单栏中查看你的空间。Spaceman可以让你看到你当前所处的空间与你拥有的其他空间的相对关系。命名这些空间也是一个选项。
localize.tagline: 一个macOS应用程序，在菜单栏中查看虚拟桌面。

localize.description: Spaceman是一款適用於macOS的應用程序，它允許你在菜單欄中查看你的空間。Spaceman可以讓你看到你當前所處的空間與你擁有的其他空間的相對關係。命名這些空間也是一個選項。
localize.tagline: 一個macOS應用程序，在菜單欄中查看虛擬桌面。

previous.excerpt: Bambuser’s Live Video Shopping technology drives customer engagement and sales for some of the world’s largest brands and retailers. Bambuser is now the platform of choice for companies seeking deeper connection with customers across digital platforms.
previous.title: Bambuser - Live video shopping

localize.description: Bambuser的实时视频购物技术为一些世界上最大的品牌和零售商推动了客户参与和销售。Bambuser现已成为企业在数字平台上寻求与客户更深层次联系的首选平台。
Bambuser的實時視頻購物技術爲一些世界上最大的品牌和零售商推動了客戶參與和銷售。Bambuser現已成爲企業在數字平臺上尋求與客戶更深層次聯繫的首選平臺。
